Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Interface ClientConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
SocketClientConnection
public interface ClientConnection
ClientConnection is an interface that handles the connection between client and server, by sending messages to the client and receiving messages from the client

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addListener(String propertyName, PropertyChangeListener listener)
    Adds a listener to this, that will listen the specified property name
    void
    asyncSend(Object message)
    Asynchronously sends a message to the client
    void
    closeConnection()
    Close the connection with the client
    void
    sendError(ErrorMessageType error, String description)
    Send the specified error, with the specified description to the client
    void
    setSetupDone(boolean setupDone)
    Set the setupDone property, that will inform the ClientConnection that the client have done all the setup stuff

  • Method Details

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Close the connection with the client

    • asyncSend

      void asyncSend(Object message)
      Asynchronously sends a message to the client
      Parameters:
      message - the message that will be sent

    • addListener

      void addListener(String propertyName, PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Adds a listener to this, that will listen the specified property name
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property
      listener - the listener that will listen the property

    • setSetupDone

      void setSetupDone(boolean setupDone)
      Set the setupDone property, that will inform the ClientConnection that the client have done all the setup stuff
      Parameters:
      setupDone - true if the client have completed the setup phase, otherwise false

    • sendError

      void sendError(ErrorMessageType error, String description)
      Send the specified error, with the specified description to the client
      Parameters:
      error - the error type that will be sent to the client
      description - the description of the error
